EmailTemplate.name: Edited Website Draft (WD) Ready - Non Pinnacle
EmailTemplate.subject: Let's Launch Your Property Website!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for your patience. Great news, the edits have been implemented on the property website!
Review the website ➡️ View Here Approve/submit edits ➡️ Click Here
As a reminder, once the website is live you will have access to edit the website or the Luxury Presence Support Team can help!
Let us know if you have any questions.
Best,
Self Serve Property Websites Luxury Presence Phone: (310) 955-1077 Email: support@luxurypresence.com
